description: Turbot empowers Cloud and DevOps teams to conquer cloud complexity, Turbot is adding their own swag for contributions to their projects. They will offer unique Turbot stickers and t-shirts for no-code, low-code and high-code contributions.
Code, Solve issues, & Win exclusive rewards üéÅüéÅüéÅ while making an impact!
The freeCodeCamp.org community is possible thanks to thousands of kind volunteers. Freecodecamp welcome all contributions to the community and are excited to welcome you aboard.

several different opportunities for community members to participate with Mattermost and Hacktoberfest and earn digital swag! Mattermost also planted a tree for every contribution, matching your commitment to open source with a commitment to the planet.
TQLA welcomes your contributions during the hacktoberfest! If you complete the tasks we set in the TQLA repository, we'll get digital badges!
